A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/trace">Trace</a> object represents the records that have been loaded from XRay log files generated by instrumented binaries. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/trace/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A Trace object represents the records that have been loaded from XRay</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// log files generated by instrumented binaries. We encapsulate the logic of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reading the traces in factory functions that populate the Trace object</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// appropriately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Trace objects provide an accessor to an XRayFileHeader which says more about</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// details of the file from which the XRay trace was loaded from.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Usage:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   if (auto TraceOrErr = loadTraceFile(&quot;xray-log.something.xray&quot;)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     auto&amp; T = &#42;TraceOrErr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // T.getFileHeader() will provide information from the trace header.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     for (const XRayRecord &amp;R : T) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       // ... do something with R here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // Handle the error here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/trace"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/xray/trace">Trace</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
